net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.network.Network
      • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.network.Server

  • public abstract class Server
extends Network
    Class used to create a Server instance that can be used to receive and transfer data along a Network.

    Apr 26, 2013 at 11:11:21 PM, v0.1
